messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] fears---and thanks
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/24/03 1:06:44 PM, kbcdlovejo@aol.com writes:  I think it takes a while for some
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/24/03 1:06:44 PM, kbcdlovejo@... writes:

<< Sandra gets blasted here (and other places) a lot. <g> I think it takes a
while for some to "warm up" to her and her style. Considering the amount of
"complaint mail" she gets, I KNOW notes like this are VERY much appreciated!
>>

Thanks.
I really do appreciate reminders that I don't thoroughly suck, and that every
person who looked into unschooling and decided not to didn't leave JUST
because I'm too blunt and pushy.

To hear some of that, you'd think I never contributed to unschooling in any
way, I just stand by the door and run people off.

Sandra

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] fears---and thanks
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/24/2003 2:12:42 PM Eastern Standard Time, ... Sandra gets blasted here (and other places) a lot.  I think it takes a while for some to
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/24/2003 2:12:42 PM Eastern Standard Time,
astrologerdawn@... writes:
> I have to say Sandra that when I knew I was going back to self directed
> learning for Zak this is the only list I wanted to come back too.
> Mainly because of your leadership and the incredible things I've learned
> by reading what you have written. The quality of women on this list is
> wonderful and I learn so much. This is a list where I get my strength
> from. Keep on saying what you have been saying. For one I'm very
> supportive of your outspokenness.


Sandra gets blasted here (and other places) a lot. <g> I think it takes a
while for some to "warm up" to her and her style. Considering the amount of
"complaint mail" she gets, I KNOW notes like this are VERY much appreciated!

It IS a good place---thanks in great part to Sandra.

~Kelly


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
